item.title: Power Platform Clinic Episode 7: Automatically Tag DevOps Tickets by Email
item.description: Auto-Tag DevOps Tickets via Email using Power Automate In this episode of the Power Platform Clinic, we explore how to keep Azure DevOps tickets updated when discussions happen over email. item.title: At Learner to Leader: Avoid Costly Mistakes: Backing Up Your Power Platform Development Environment
item.description: What Would Happen If You Lost Your Dev Environment? Ever wondered what would happen if someone accidentally deleted your development site or overwrote a key flow? Rebuilding from memory isn’t just frustrating â€” itâ€™s costly. This post walks through the process I demonstrated during my session with the Power Platform Learner to Leader community, showing how to automatically back up your environment using Azure DevOps, without requiring advanced YAML knowledge.
